name: the only crystal
description:
the only crystal "humanity is an interesting one. the species evolved over the span of nearly three million years. for them, that’s quite a long time, but in the big scale of the universe, humanity was barely a toddler. and then it all went to shit."

faith, science, and money: in this short piece of speculative fiction, they all threaten to destroy what's left of this fragile world. can you  protect the only crystal left?

***

my second godot wild jam! and my first time playing with 2d, tilemaps, kinematics, etc. music, voice and graphics all made by myself.

resources used, all free and open source:

* godot 3.4.4 / <3
* libresprite / pixel art
* audacity    / audio recording for voice and music
* inkscape    / vector illustration for the logo
* fonts used  / fira family
* dialogic    / godot dialogue plugin
* shader      / cc0 outline shader
* motivation  / godot wild jam #44!
